DOC.brief_summary: The study aims to characterise the influence of the autonomic nervous system activity on the development of the lipodystrophy syndrome in HIV-infected patients by measuring heart rate variability and various metabolic pathways in HIV patients receiving highly active antiretroviral therapy.
DOC.brief_title: Role of the Autonomic Nervous System in HIV-Lipodystrophy
DOC.criteria: HIVinfection Age above 18 years No AIDS defining event during last 6 months No infection during last 6 weeks No concommitant drug interfering with insulin sensitivity and ANSactivity
